General.Name: Shanghai Taihe Water Environmental Technology Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Taihe Water Environmental Technology Development Co.,Ltd. offers underwater ecological restoration research and development services in China. It uses algae-eating insect-guided underwater ecological restoration technology. The company provides on-site survey, water quality testing, scheme design, ecosystem construction, and system maintenance services, and other integrated solutions. It also engages in ecosystem recovery of black-odor, rural water, and reservoirs, as well as deed purification of recycled water business. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, China.
